titleStmt.title: The Law of charitable uses revised and much enlarged with many cases in law both antient and modern whereunto is now added the learned reading of Sr. Francis Moor, Kt. ... upon the statute of 43 Eliz. concerning charitable uses (who was a member of that Parliament when that statute was made and the penner thereof) : abridged by himself and now printed by his own original manuscript : together with the manner of proceedings in Chancery ... for relief on divers cases wherein the aid of this statute is not required ... necessary for all bishops, cathedrals, colledges, and all parishes in England for recovery and setling of charitable donations methodically digested by George Duke of the Inner Temple, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Duke, George, Esq.
Moore, Francis, Sir, 1558-1621.

titleStmt.title: The Law of charitable uses revised and much enlarged with many cases in law both antient and modern whereunto is now added the learned reading of Sr. Francis Moor, Kt. ... upon the statute of 43 Eliz. concerning charitable uses (who was a member of that Parliament when that statute was made and the penner thereof) : abridged by himself and now printed by his own original manuscript : together with the manner of proceedings in Chancery ... for relief on divers cases wherein the aid of this statute is not required ... necessary for all bishops, cathedrals, colledges, and all parishes in England for recovery and setling of charitable donations methodically digested by George Duke of the Inner Temple, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Duke, George, Esq.
Moore, Francis, Sir, 1558-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Twyford and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: This work appears at reel 314:8 as Wing D2504 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1747:24 as Wing M2539.
In copy at reel 314:8, page 51 has print missing in the filmed copy. Pages 40-65 photographed from LC copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of originals in Law School Library, Yale University, and Huntington Library.
